greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of signed numbers used for the computation of the column sequences of triangle A089504.
formula: a(n, m)= D(n)*((-1)^(n-m))*(((m+2)*(m+1)*m)^(n-1))/(product(fallfac(m+2, 3)-fallfac(r+2, 3), r=1..m-1)*product(fallfac(r+2, 3)-fallfac(m+2, 3), r=m+1..n)), with D(n) := A089506(n) and fallfac(n, m) := A008279(n, m) (falling factorials), 1<=m<=n else 0. (Replace in the denominator the first product by 1 if m=1 and the second one by 1 if m=n.)
mathematica: b[n_, m_] := (-1)^(n - m)*FactorialPower[m + 2, 3]^(n - 1)/(Product[ FactorialPower[m + 2, 3] - FactorialPower[r + 2, 3], {r, 1, m - 1}] * Product[ FactorialPower[r + 2, 3] - FactorialPower[m + 2, 3], {r, m + 1, n}]); den[n_] := LCM @@ Table[ Denominator[b[n, m]], {m, 1, n}]; a[n_, m_] := den[n]*b[n, m]; Table[a[n, m], {n, 1, 10}, {m, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Sep 02 2016 *)
results.author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Dec 01 2003
